name: Cast Bronze Chain Ring Picture Frame *Custom*
description:
These custom cast picture frames are hand cast in bronze from a real bicycle cog. This is a custom item, the frame pictured is only an example. Imagine the possibilities! See your name cast in metal! It will outlive you!

This frame is meant to be hung on the wall, but can be adapted to sit on a tabletop or mantle and a holder provided upon request. 

**HOW IT'S MADE: Each frame in this series starts out with a real bicycle cog and is turned into a pattern. A resin sand mould is made from this pattern. Then scrap bronze is cut up, melted in a furnace, and carefully poured into the cavity inside the mould. When the castings cool, they are cut apart, polished and finished. It's dangerous! It's hot! It's art! 
Each casting is coated in weatherproof clear lacquer to prevent tarnishing. 
*Patina and special finishes available upon request for an additional charge*


*Custom and Bulk orders available. I can cast all kinds of stuff! Contact me for your one-of-a-kind order.* 

A great family heirloom!

name: Squirrel Nutkin Handbound Photo Album/Brag Book
description:
This hand-bound photo album was handcrafted from a salvaged Squirrel Nutkin Beatrix Potter storybook. Original cover is sage green with contrasting hand-stitching on the binding. 

Original endpapers have adorable pictures of characters from the original Beatrix Potter stories. Twelve hand-sewn photo pocket signatures will hold 24 photographs of your favorite Nutkins.

name: Vintage Upcycled Handbound Colorful Journal
description: This journal was handmade from an upcycled vintage novel about the whimsy and drama of carnival life in France in the 50s. Original cover has funky colored illustrations, and some of the original drawings and chapter pages were salvaged to complement each signature. A poppy red button and string keeps the journal securely closed, with the string doubling as a bookmark. Two handmade pockets throughout the book await your tiny mementos and scraps of ideas. This book is one of a kind with roughly 90 lined pages waiting for your next big idea or empassioned rant! personalized note can be added to inside of front cover

name: Cast Iron WTF Bike Cog Picture Frame
description: This unique frame was hand cast in iron from a real bicycle cog. Perfect for framing your most beloved bike enthusiast, pet, memorable night out, or this strange and mysterious Russian man from a magazine! Who is that guy!? Magnets and a custom fit disc of clear cellophane are included with each frame to attach a picture to the back. A sturdy yet elegant hand made wire stand is also included for display on a mantle or tabletop. **HOW IT'S MADE: ** Each frame in this series starts out with a real bicycle cog and is turned into a pattern. A resin sand mould is made from this pattern. Then scrap iron is busted up, melted in a furnace, and carefully poured into the cavity inside the mould. When the castings cool, they are cut apart, polished and finished. Each casting is coated in weatherproof clear lacquer to prevent rusting. It's hot! It's dangerous! It's priceless! *Custom and Bulk orders available. Contact me for your one-of-a-kind order.* -Personalize your frames with family names, names of pets, pet names, inside jokes, etc. A fantastic one-of-a-kind handmade gift!

name: Custom Cast Iron Bike Cog Picture Frame
description: This unique frame was hand cast in iron from a real bicycle cog and is roughly 4.5" in diameter. Perfect for framing your most beloved bike enthusiast, memorable night out, or in this case, someone else's precious puppy! Additional sizes and finishes available. Magnets are included with each frame to attach the picture and a piece of clear cellophane to the back. A sturdy yet elegant hand made wire stand is also included for display on a mantle or tabletop. Frames can be adapted to hang on a wall. **HOW IT'S MADE: Each frame in this series starts out with a real bicycle cog and is turned into a pattern. A resin sand mould is made from this pattern. Then scrap iron is busted up, melted in a furnace, and carefully poured into the cavity inside the mould. When the castings cool, they are cut apart, polished and finished. Each casting is coated in weatherproof clear lacquer to prevent rusting. It's hot! It's dangerous! It's art!** Custom and Bulk orders available. Contact me for your one-of-a-kind order. -Personalize your frames with family names, names of pets, pet names, inside jokes, etc. -Plain 4.5" chain ring with a name is $25, larger sizes are available upon request for minimal additional charge Buy more and $ave -All custom items this size are $25 for one or 2 for $40. Get a friend in on it! You'll match!
